n0:createOracleProcedure.n0:source: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "HR"."ADD_JOB_HISTORY" ( p_emp_id job_history.employee_id%type , p_start_date job_history.start_date%type , p_end_date job_history.end_date%type , p_job_id job_history.job_id%type , p_department_id job_history.department_id%type ) IS BEGIN INSERT INTO job_history (employee_id, start_date, end_date, job_id, department_id) VALUES(p_emp_id, p_start_date, p_end_date, p_job_id, p_department_id); END add_job_history;
